item.title: Heatmap for My Twitter Activity Tracking
item.description: library(rtweet) library(lubridate) ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ---------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.2.1 v purrr 0.3.3 ## v tibble 2.1.3 v dplyr 0.8.3 ## v tidyr 1.0.0 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.4.0 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x lubridate::as.difftime() masks base::as.difftime() ## x lubridate::date() masks base::date() ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x purrr::flatten() masks rtweet::flatten() ## x lubridate::intersect() masks base::intersect() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ## x lubridate::setdiff() masks base::setdiff() ## x lubridate::union() masks base::union() source("https://raw.
